channel.title: SkillCape requirements help
channel.description: On my server, it lets anybody no matter what lvl to wear a 99 skillcape, if anybody knows the coding or a tutorial link to fix where players have to have lvl 99 to wear a cape plz message me or post. thanx :3 sorry im new at coding and if i have this in the wrong section soz.. :/

item.title: SkillCape requirements help
item.dc:creator: @scenemo scenemo
item.description:
@scenemo wrote:

thx for the advice, but some players that already have the skill get the cape and hand it out. i want it so that if its in their inv and they click on it it’ll say you need 99 to equip

Read full topic

item.title: SkillCape requirements help
item.dc:creator: @zyle1992 Zymus
item.description:
@zyle1992 wrote:

Well i would suggest that you go to whatever method/shop/etc that allows them to buy the capes, and before they buy, check if they have the required level. if they don’t tell them so and break. If they do, remove enough money/tokens and add the item to their inventory.

Read full topic
